item.title: Battery Managment System
item.description: A battery management system (BMS) is any electronic system that manages a rechargeable battery ( cell or battery pack), such as by protecting the battery from operating outside its safe operating area, monitoring its state, calculating secondary data, reporting that data, controlling its environment, authenticating it and / or balancing it.

item.title: Editing Content in Quartz
item.description: Editing Quartz runs on top of Hugo so all notes are written in Markdown. Folder Structure Here’s a rough overview of what’s what.

item.title: Callouts
item.description: Callout support Quartz supports the same Admonition-callout syntax as Obsidian. This includes 12 Distinct callout types (each with several aliases) Collapsable callouts See documentation on supported types and syntax here.

item.title: Como Realizar Modificações na Wiki?
item.description: [!INFO] Não é simples Mas também não é difícil. Setup do GitHub O GitHub do Fórmula-E Siará possui total acesso aos arquivos que compõem o site.

item.title: Fórmula-E Siará
item.description: Então você quer saber mais sobre o Fórmula-E Siará? Carrinho Sistema de Propulsão Baterias Objetivos e Desafios A Bateria precisa ter uma capacidade de carga razoável A Bateria precisa ser carregada com [[desgaste]] mínimo A Bateria exige um [[Battery Managment System|monitoriamento]] constante

item.title: Troubleshooting and FAQ
item.description: Still having trouble? Here are a list of common questions and problems people encounter when installing Quartz. While you’re here, join our Discord :)

item.title: Updating
item.description: Haven’t updated Quartz in a while and want all the cool new optimizations? On Unix/Mac systems you can run the following command for a one-line update!
